text: Anora is a 2024 American romantic comedy-drama movie written, directed, and edited by Sean Baker. It is about a quick marriage between Brooklyn stripper Anora (Mikey Madison) and son of a Russian oligarch Ivan Zakharov (Mark Eydelshteyn). Anora was released on October 18, 2024, by Neon to strong positive reviews. It won five awards at the 97th Academy Awards, more than any other movie, winning for Best Picture, Best Actress (Madison), Best Original Screenplay, Best Film Editing, and Best Director. ==References== Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:2024 drama movies Category:2024 comedy movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Las Vegas Category:Movies featuring a Best Actress Academy Award-winning performance Category:2020s English-language movies
title: Anora
